title: new monitor graphic fix
body: everytime i move the camera in league everything gets highlighted around the structure with black lines. ever since i moved from 60hz to 144hz this has been happening and i still havent found a solution. also everytime i stand still it looks normal with no structures outline with black.

replies.body:
Perhaps try turning character inking off? Maybe v-sync too? Could be some weird interaction there.

Other possible solutions would include making sure your GPU drivers are up to date, and as a drastic measure running a clean reinstall.
